New Records: Messi scored his 109th international goal and first of the tournament
Key Match Events: Julián Álvarez scored in the 22nd minute
Lionel Messi scored in the 51st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi said, "It's insane what this team has done, what the Argentina national team is doing. For those who remain from the old guard, it's beyond impressive that the national team is in another final."
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina fans gathered in Times Square on the eve of the match and filled the streets of Manhattan before heading to MetLife Stadium
Others: Canada star Alphonso Davies limped off after his right leg was caught in a clean challenge with Gonzalo Montiel
The game was played on a temporary grass surface at MetLife Stadium
